name: Spess Adventure
description:
Spess Adventure This Game was created for the Beginners Circle Jam 3#  by Reddragonclaw and Hotshots Notice: I made an error in the Upload and replaced the GameJam version with the Bugfix version I am sorry! Even though this will get disqualified please leave a small feedback ^^ Controls:
  • On Surface:
  • H - Heal
  • Q - Harvest/Attack mode for pistol
  • F - Enter Shuttle
  • X - Leave Shuttle
  • R - Reload
  • I - Inventory
  • Space - In Shuttle going up until you get the option to leave Atmosphere
  • In Spess/Space:
    • X - Spacebrake
    • W/S forward/backwards
    • A/D strafing
    • H - Repair
    • O - Refill oxygen
    • F - Refuel
    • R - Reload
    • I - Inventory
    Known Bugs:

    Entering an Planet twice will either create too much blocks or will generate nothing at all

    Using Inventory in Space causes game to crash (it worked in the Engine)

    Tree spawning on Hot Planets

    Feel free to name more since there are certainly more (especially those based arround the temporary save system)

    Spess Man greets all of you
